ファン不足で目標のレースに出走\\\\nできません。レースに出走しましょう。: You lack the minimum amount of fans\\nfor the target race, let's run in a race.
このままでは目標のファン数に到達\\\\nできません。レースに出走しましょう。: You can't reach the target number \\nof fans as it is. Let's do some race.
目標としてきたレース当日ですね。\\\\nあとはレースの結果を見守りましょう。: It's the day of the race we've been\\naiming for. Let's keep an eye on it.
トレーニングに差し支えのある状態に\\\\nなっているので保健室に行きましょう。: The condition seems unsuitable for\\ntraining. Let's go to the infirmary.
体力が低下しているのでケガの恐れが\\\\nあります。お休みも大切ですよ。: Low energy may cause injury.\\nIt's important to have some rest too.
体力が低いのでケガの恐れがあります。\\\\nお出かけしてリフレッシュしましょう: Fatigue may cause injury in training. \\nLet's rest and recover some energy.
レース直前なのに調子がイマイチです。\\\\nお出かけして気分転換も大切ですよ。: Keep your mood in a good state before the race.\\nLet's go out and find change of pace.

このままでは目標を達成できません。\\\\nレースに出走しましょう。: You can't achieve the goal as it is.\\nLet's do some race.
このままでは目標の成績Ptに到達\\\\nできません。レースに出走しましょう。: You're running behind on your target Result Pt. Enter a few races.

新シリーズ配信アニメプロジェクト始動！\\\\nアニメ『ROAD TO THE: A new anime project is here! ROAD TO THE TOP now airing on Pakatube!
トレセン学園では日々たくさんの出来事が起こります。\\\\n<color=#ff: A lot of things happen every day at the Tracen Academy. Choose a <color=#ff9900>nurturing scenario</color> and solve the problems surrounding the school. Conquering these scenarios will help your horse girl grow!
ウマ娘と<color=#ff9900>トゥインクル・シリーズ</color>で3: Spend 3 years with Uma Musume in the <color=#ff9900>Twinkle Series</color> and work together to make their <color=#ff9900>dreams come true</color> ! The Uma Musume's goals are diverse. Guide many different girls to become a great trainer.
ウマ娘たちは個性豊かな子ばかり。\\\\nウマ娘ごとに基礎能力やスキル、適性など: All of the Uma Musume have unique personalities. Each Uma Musume has different basic abilities, skills, and aptitudes. You can train them as many times as you like, so let's start by <color=#ff9900>raising your favorite Uma Musume</color>.
<color=#ff9900>想い（因子）</color>を受け継がせてみましょ: Inheriting <color=#ff9900>feelings (factors)</color> increases ability and aptitude at the start of training, and your Uma Musume will grow through <color=#ff9900>Inheritance Events</color>. Inherited girls won't disappear from the Hall of Fame, so take advantage to raise stronger Uma Musume!
サポートカードを<color=#ff9900>編成</color>してみましょう: <color=#ff9900>Organize</color> support cards to receive corresponding <color=#ff9900>support effects</color> and <color=#ff9900>training events</color> from those characters. Note that you can not use cards of the Uma Musume you are training.
サポートカードには<color=#ff9900>タイプ（得意トレーニング）</c: There are <color=#ff9900>types (specialty training)</color> of support cards. The effects they exhibit when training together are different.
育成中にサポートカードの絆ゲージを上げて、\\\\n得意トレーニングを行うと<c: When you raise the bond gauge of your support card during training and perform your specialty training, <color=#ff9900>Friendship Training</color> will occur. In Friendship Training, your Uma Musume will grow bigger than normal!
<color=#ff9900>強化アイテム</color>を使用して<color: Use <color=#ff9900>enhancement items</color> to increase your <color=#ff9900>Awakening Lv</color>. Raising your Awakening Lv will increase the number of skills you can acquire during training. Reinforcement items can be obtained through training and daily races.
<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘のピース</color>を使用して<colo: Use <color=#ff9900>Uma Musume pieces</color> to <color=#ff9900>uncap</color> them. This will increase the basic ability of the Uma Musume. Also, when they reach the rank of ★3, they will receive a <color=#ff9900>victory outfit</color>.
<color=#ff9900>サポートPt</color>と<color=#ff: Use your <color=#ff9900>Support Pt</color> and <color=#ff9900>Money</color> to <color=#ff9900>increase the Lv</color>. As the Lv increases, your support effects will increase, giving you an edge in your training. Strengthening items can be obtained through training and daily races.
<color=#ff9900>同一のサポートカード</color>を使用して<c: Use <color=#ff9900>copies of the same support card</color> to <color=#ff9900>uncap</color>. Uncapping increases the upper level limit and you can further strengthen the support card's Lvl.
複数枚所持しているサポートカードは<color=#ff9900>蹄鉄</colo: Support cards dupes can be converted into <color=#ff9900>Horseshoes</color> . These valuable items can be exchanged in the store. The first support card you acquire will be stored in the support card list, subsequent cards will be displayed in the vault and can be converted.
育成を完了すると<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>とな: When you complete training, your Uma Musume will be saved in the <color=#ff9900>Hall of Fame</color>. Once there, she can enter the team stadium and various races, can be inherited in training, or transferred, upon which she is irrevocably lost.
育成ウマ娘のピースは<color=#ff9900>クローバー</color>に変: Uma Musume pieces can be converted into <color=#ff9900>clovers</color>. Clovers are valuable and can be exchanged for items in the store. Be careful when converting pieces, as they can be used to release the Uma Musume you are training and to develop new talents.
チーム＜シリウス＞を率いて、\\\\nウマ娘たちと<color=#ff9900>: Lead your team, Sirius, through the <color=#ff9900>main story</color> with the Uma Musume! You can earn rewards by progressing through the story.
育成ウマ娘と出会ったり<color=#ff9900>親愛度</color>を高め: Meeting new horsegirls and increasing their <color=#ff9900>affection</color> allows you to progress through <color=#ff9900>their personal stories</color>. Rewards are gained for progressing through the stories.
殿堂入りウマ娘で<color=#ff9900>チーム</color>を結成し、\: Form a <color=#ff9900>team</color> of Hall of Fame Uma Musume and compete against teams from all over the country in the <color=#ff9900>team arena</color>. Your team's <color=#ff9900>CLASS</color> will increase according to its success, and each week you will earn rewards according to the CLASS you belong to.
優れたレース結果を残すと<color=#ff9900>ハイスコア</color>: A <color=#ff9900>high score</color> will be recorded for outstanding race results. Each week, the CLASS to which you belong will change based on your high score.
チーム競技場では、一度に<color=#ff9900>条件の異なる5レース</c: In the team arena, five races with different <color=#ff9900>conditions</color> are held at a time. The higher your CLASS, the more people you can run in each race, up to a maximum of 15 Uma Musume. Form the strongest team you can and challenge the team arena!
<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>たちを編成し、<co: Form your own <color=#ff9900>team</color> of <color=#ff9900>Hall of Famers</color>. For each of the five races with different conditions, choose the Uma Musume with the best aptitude. The <color=#ff9900>ace</color> horse girl will get <color=#ff9900>1.1 times</color> the score.
強い殿堂入りウマ娘を編成すると、\\\\n<color=#ff9900>チーム評: The more strong Uma Musume you have in your team, the higher your <color=#ff9900>team rating</color> will be and the higher your <color=#ff9900>team rank</color> will be. The higher your team rank, the more rewards you can earn.
チーム競技場では<color=#ff9900>チーム評価の近い相手</color: In the team arena, you will play against <color=#ff9900>opponents with similar team ratings</color>. The higher your team rating, the higher your score will be. Form a strong team and conquer the team arena!
殿堂入りウマ娘でレジェンドレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\\\nレースの着順が良: Challenge the Legend Race with your saved horse girls. The higher you finish, the more rewards you get. Tickets required for participation are replenished at 05:00 during the event period and when the LEGEND Uma Musume is switched.
殿堂入りウマ娘でデイリーレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\\\n挑戦するレースに応: Challenge your Hall of Fame horse girl to a daily race. You can earn various rewards depending on the races you challenge. Each day, you will receive up to the <color=#ff9900>maximum number of tickets</color>.
練習では、<color=#ff9900>好きな条件で</color>自由にレース: In Practice, you can freely hold races under <color=#ff9900>any conditions you want</color>. In addition to the Hall of Fame Uma Musume you have bred, you can also run races with <color=#ff9900>other trainers' Uma Musume</color>. You can train with up to 18 Uma Musume at once!
チーム競技場やルームマッチなどで見かけた気になるウマ娘を\\\\n<color=: If you see any Uma Musume you like in the team arena or room match, you can register her as your <color=#ff9900>Training Partner</color> so that you can run races with her. The representative horse girl of the friends you are following will also be able to run in the race.
自慢の<color=#ff9900>殿堂入りウマ娘</color>をサークルやS: You can <color=#ff9900>share</color> your favorite <color=#ff9900>Hall of Fame Uma Musume</color> with your circle and SNS. Actively register your Practice Partners from circle members and friends to enhance your practice!
全国のトレーナーたちと<color=#ff9900>サークルに加入</color: Join a <color=#ff9900>circle</color> with other trainers from around the country. You can interact with other members and help each other with training.
メンバー同士で<color=#ff9900>様々なアイテム</color>を贈り: Members can give each other a <color=#ff9900>variety of items</color> . You can also rent each other's <color=#ff9900>representative Uma Musume</color> for inheritance at a discount.
獲得した<color=#ff9900>楽曲</color>のライブを視聴すること: <size=26>You can watch live performances of <color=#ff9900>songs</color> you have acquired. Choose main and back dancers from trained Uma Musume and acquired costumes to watch the live with your favorite combination. Songs marked with <color=#ff9900>\"Singing\"</color>, are voiced by the selected Uma Musume. Songs can be acquired through the main story and training.</size>
トレーナー情報の確認や設定が行えます。\\\\n<color=#ff9900>誕: You can check and set your trainer information. On your <color=#ff9900>birthday</color>, you will receive a congratulatory comment from Uma Musume on the home screen, and changing your <color=#ff9900>gender</color> will change some scenarios. (Gender can be changed at any time)
<color=#ff9900>代表ウマ娘</color>や<color=#ff9: You can set up <color=#ff9900>representative Uma Musume</color> and <color=#ff9900>support cards</color> to help your followers in their training. You will earn <color=#ff9900>Friend Pt the next day</color> depending on the number of times you do this. (This will be given as a gift)
<color=#ff9900>称号ミッション</color>や<color=#f: You can earn titles through <color=#ff9900>title missions</color> and <color=#ff9900>events</color>. You can change the title you have earned at any time.
理事長の夢に協力し、コンプリートを目指してみましょう！\\\\n育成中の重賞レー: Help the Chairman reach her dream! You can earn <color=#ff9900>trophies and rewards</color> when you win graded races during training, or Legend Races. In addition, you can earn rewards by completing missions to collect the specified number of trophies.
<color=#ff9900>フォロー</color>したフレンドの代表ウマ娘や: You can select the representative horse girl and support card of the friends you <color=#ff9900>follow</color> from each list in training. You also earn more Friend Pt by helping a <color=#ff9900>mutual follower</color> to train. If you don't have many followers, try looking in the <color=#ff9900>recommendations</color>.
ウマ娘に関わる記録を集めて<color=#ff9900>名鑑Lv</color>: Collect records related to Uma Musume to raise your <color=#ff9900>Index Lv</color>. You'll accumulate Index Exp based on the evaluation points you've earned through training and the stories you've viewed, and you'll earn rewards as your Index Lv increases.
狙いを定めてウマ娘ぬいぐるみ（ぱかプチ）をGETしましょう！\\\\n挑戦回数<: Take aim and get the Uma Musume Plushie (Paka-Puchi)! If you can get at least one of them in <color=#ff9900>3 attempts</color>, you've succeeded. Your Uma Musume might then wake up with a <color=#ff9900>new hint</color>!
<color=#ff9900>CLASS2</color>昇級おめでとうございま: Congratulations on your <color=#ff9900>CLASS 2</color> promotion! The <color=#ff9900>second slot</color> for team formation has been released. The second slot for team formation has been released, allowing you to organize more Uma Musume for the Hall of Fame.
<color=#ff9900>CLASS3</color>昇級おめでとうございま: Congratulations on your <color=#ff9900>CLASS 3</color> promotion! The <color=#ff9900>third slot</color> for team formation has been released, allowing you to organize more Hall of Fame Uma Musume.
育成では、ウマ娘ごとに設定された<color=#ff9900>目標レース</co: The aim of the training is to achieve good results in the <color=#ff9900>target races</color> set for each horse girl. In order to achieve good results in races, you need to <color=#ff9900>develop your basic abilities</color> through <color=#ff9900>training</color>!
<color=#ff9900>スキル</color>を獲得することで、<colo: By acquiring <color=#ff9900>skills</color>, you can gain a <color=#ff9900>variety of effects</color> in <color=#ff9900>races</color>. The Skill Points needed to acquire skills are mainly obtained through races, but can also be obtained through some events.
<color=#ff9900>体力が少なくなったり</color>、<color: If your Uma Musume's <color=#ff9900>energy or motivation is low</color> she will not be able to perform at her best in training or races. <color=#ff9900>Resting</color> restores energy, and <color=#ff9900>going out</color> boosts motivation. Always pay attention to her condition!
育成中、ウマ娘のトレーニングや体調に悪い影響を及ぼす\\\\n<color=#f: During training, you may acquire <color=#ff9900>conditions</color> that have a negative effect on your horse girl's training and physical condition. The <color=#ff9900>Infirmary</color> has a chance of eliminating bad conditions, so make use of it quickly.
ウマ娘の育成中はさまざまなコマンドを実行できます！\\\\nそれぞれのコマンドを: You can execute various commands while training your Uma Musume! Use each command in a well-balanced manner to make your Uma Musume into a great Uma Musume!
ジュニア級6月後半からは<color=#ff9900>レース</color>に出: <size=26>From the latter half of June in Junior class, you can start <color=#ff9900>racing</color>. Train your horse girl well and aim for <color=#ff9900>first place</color>! In races, you earn <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color> to acquire skills and <color=#ff9900>Fans</color> to run in big races, based on your finishing position. You'll also earn random items based on your position and margin.</size>
ウマ娘たちは<color=#ff9900>メイクデビュー</color>で初めて: Uma Musumes make their first appearance on the racing stage in their <color=#ff9900>make debut</color>. If they finish first, they can run in various races. If they don't, you'll have to try to win one of the <color=#ff9900>Maiden Races</color> available!
トレーニングで得られるスピードやスタミナなどの<color=#ff9900>基礎: <color=#ff9900>Basic abilities</color> such as speed and stamina, gained through training, are linked to <color=#ff9900>the various abilities displayed during races</color>. Which you need varies greatly with <color=#ff9900>distance</color> and <color=#ff9900>running strategy</color>, so <color=#ff9900>create a training menu that suits her</color>!
レースが行われる<color=#ff9900>バ場</color>と<color: The <color=#ff9900>surface and distance</color> where the races take place differ. Your Uma Musume suits different tracks depending on her <color=#ff9900>surface and distance aptitudes</color>. Aim for races that are <color=#ff9900>marked with a ★</color> in the list, and go for the win!
レースは<color=#ff9900>プレオープン・オープン・GⅢ・GⅡ・GⅠ<: The races are divided into five grades: <color=#ff9900>Pre-Open, Open, GIII, GII, and GI</color>. Let's start with the <color=#ff9900>Pre-Open, Open</color> to win the highest G1 race in the Twinkle Series!
<color=#ff9900>体力</color>を消費して<color=#ff: You can grow your horse girl's <color=#ff9900>basic abilities</color> by spending <color=#ff9900>energy</color> to <color=#ff9900>train</color> her. In addition to <color=#ff9900>recovering</color> energy, more <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color> can be gained from the Wisdom training than other training.
<color=#ff9900>サポートカード</color>に編成されたウマ娘と: Training with Uma Musumes organized as a <color=#ff9900>support card</color> will increase your <color=#ff9900>training efficiency and bond gauge</color>. When the bond gauge is full, <color=#ff9900>Friendship Training</color> can occur. You may <color=#ff9900>gain various benefits</color> if certain others watch you train as well.
トレーニングでサポートカードのウマ娘に<color=#ff9900>「！」マーク: When a support card horse girl has a <color=#ff9900>! mark</color> on her, grab your chance to <color=#ff9900>increase Hint Lv of one of this partner's skills</color> upon successfully completing the training session. This will confer a <color=#ff9900>discount on the Skill Pt needed to acquire the skill</color>.
ウマ娘の<color=#ff9900>体力が少ない</color>状態でトレーニ: If you train your Uma Musume when her <color=#ff9900>energy is low</color>, she may <color=#ff9900>fail the training</color> and her ability may not improve. There are <color=#ff9900>various disadvantages</color> to failing a training session, so always keep an eye on her <color=#ff9900>energy and failure rate</color>!
<color=#ff9900>スキルPt</color>を消費することで、レース: By spending <color=#ff9900>Skill Points</color>, you can acquire <color=#ff9900>skills</color> that activate during races. There are various conditions to activate skills, such as the <color=#ff9900>race distance and running strategy</color>, so try to <color=#ff9900>acquire skills that match her aptitudes</color>.
<color=#ff9900>サポートカードイベント</color>や<colo: The <color=#ff9900>hint Lv</color> of a skill may be increased by the result of a <color=#ff9900>Support Card or Uma Musume Event</color>. The skill Pt you <color=#ff9900>consume will be discounted</color> depending on the hint Lv, so organize support cards that have the skills you want to acquire to get the best deals.
スキルには大きく分けて次の3種類があります。\\\\n・<color=#ff99: <size=26>There are three main types of skills. <color=#ff9900>Unique skills</color> are special skills that your horse girl starts with. <color=#ff9900>Rare skills</color> are powerful skills found in special situations. <color=#ff9900>Normal Skills</color> are skills found in various situations. There are also skills that can only be acquired by <color=#ff9900>inheriting certain factors</color>.</size>
サポートカードのLvを一定までUPすると\\\\n<color=#ff9900>: If you raise the level of your support card to a certain level, you will get a <color=#ff9900>support cheer bonus that will increase your score in the team arena</color>. Let's raise the lvl of many support cards!
イベントやキャンペーンなどで解放された<color=#ff9900>限定ストーリ: You can view <color=#ff9900>limited stories</color> that have been released through events and campaigns.
イベント期間中に<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘を育成</color>し、<: During the event period, <color=#ff9900>train your horse girl</color> and earn <color=#ff9900>Event Points</color>. By collecting Event Points, you can earn various <color=#ff9900>rewards</color>.
イベントPtを集めることで\\\\n<color=#ff9900>イベント限定ス: Collecting Event Points will allow you to advance through the <color=#ff9900>event-only story</color>. By advancing the story and clearing event missions, you can earn <color=#ff9900>event limited support cards, rainbow fragments, and titles</color>.
<color=#ff9900>イベントボーナス育成ウマ娘、イベントボーナスサポー: At the end of training, any <color=#ff9900>event bonus horsegirls or support cards</color> will confer a <color=#ff9900>bonus to the event points gained</color>.
イベントミッションをクリアすると\\\\n<color=#ff9900>イベント: You can get <color=#ff9900>Event Pt and Roulette Coins</color> by completing event missions. You can also earn Roulette Coins from the <color=#ff9900>daily missions</color>.
<color=#ff9900>ルーレットコイン</color>を使って<colo: You can play <color=#ff9900>roulette derby</color> using <color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color> If you <color=#ff9900>achieve bingo</color>, you can get <color=#ff9900>event limited support cards and gold fragments</color>.
イベント期間中に<color=#ff9900>ウマ娘を育成</color>したり: During the event period, you can earn <color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color> by <color=#ff9900>training Uma Musume</color> and completing <color=#ff9900>event missions</color>. Collect <color=#ff9900>roulette coins</color>to spin the <color=#ff9900>roulette derby</color> wheel.
ルーレットダービーでの着順に応じて\\\\n<color=#ff9900>ルーレ: You can get <color=#ff9900>roulette rewards</color> according to your finishing order in the roulette derby. When you get a roulette reward you've never gotten before, it's your chance to BINGO!
獲得したルーレット報酬に応じたマスが埋まります。\\\\n縦・横・斜めの連続する: Cells will be filled according to roulette rewards earned. When 3 consecutive squares are filled (on any axis), <color=#ff9900>a line is completed</color>, and you will receive a <color=#ff9900>BINGO reward</color> based on number of lines. Complete <color=#ff9900>8 lines of BINGO</color>to exchange your first 3 sheets.
6月後半と12月後半のターン終了後に開催される\\\\n<color=#ff99: Run in the <color=#ff9900>Aoharu Hai</color>, held the turn after June and December end, and aim for victory with your team. Winning will increase your <color=#ff9900>team ranking</color>, and your <color=#ff9900>Uma Musume and team members will grow</color>. Train strong Uma Musume to <color=#ff9900>win lots of Aoharu Hai</color>!
チームメンバーを編成して、アオハル杯の優勝をめざしましょう！\\\\nアオハル杯: Put together a team to win the Aoharu Hai! With races in each category, the winner will be the one with <color=#ff9900>more wins</color> out of five. <color=#ff9900>Winning raises your team ranking</color>, more so the higher your opponent's ranking.
集めたピースを使用することで、育成ウマ娘を<color=#ff9900>解放</: By using the pieces you have collected, you can <color=#ff9900>release</color> your breeding horse girl. Once released, you will be able to take charge of them in training.
3人のウマ娘を出走登録し、<color=#ff9900>全国のトレーナー</co: Register 3 horsegirls to <color=#ff9900>match</color> and battle with <color=#ff9900>other trainers</color> in real time! Raise strong horsegirls and aim for glory!
<color=#ff9900>オープンリーグ</color>と<color=#f: There are two leagues, the <color=#ff9900>Open League</color> and the <color=#ff9900>Grade League</color>, and you can choose the one that suits you best Depending on the league, the upper limit of the <color=#ff9900>breeding rank</color> of the Hall of Fame horse girl you can register to run in the race will differ.
<color=#ff9900>ルームマッチ</color>は、他のトレーナーたち: <color=#ff9900>Room Match</color> allows you to race against other trainers with your Hall of Fame horse girl <color=#ff9900>Host</color>: Set your own conditions for the race <color=#ff9900>Join</color>: Join another trainer's race. <color=#ff9900>Watch</color>: Enter an ID to watch the race.
開催されるレースはGⅠが舞台となります。\\\\nレースを開催する場合は、2つの: The race held will be GI. There are two modes. <color=#ff9900>Simple Mode</color> allows you to hold a race right away. <color=#ff9900>Detailed mode</color> allows you to choose weather, participation conditions, etc. first. Up to <color=#ff9900>3 Uma Musume per person</color> can be entered.
<color=#ff9900>リーグの中は3つのラウンド</color>で構成さ: <color=#ff9900>The league is made up of three rounds</color>. Starting from Round 2, you will be divided into Group A and Group B, and the places you advance to will depend on your performance in each round and group. Let's move on to the final round and win the <color=#ff9900>winner</color>!
開催したレースは参加リストから参加者を募集できます。\\\\n<color=#f: Recruit participants for your races from the participation list. Trainers close to you can also be recruited using the <color=#ff9900>Circle and SNS Sharing functions</color>. For future reference, <color=#ff9900>you can save your favorite races</color>. Have a go organizing a race with your friends!
特別移籍では、殿堂入りウマ娘を<color=#ff9901>他のチームに移籍させ: In the special transfer, you can transfer your Hall of Famer to another team and get a reward. Please note that once you send a Hall of Famer to another team, she will be gone and you will not be able to get her back.
移籍先チームの希望する条件に応じて<color=#ff9901>お礼品の内容が変: <color=#ff9901>Reward contents will change</color> by application conditions of the team you wish to transfer to. In addition, each has its own expectations, and <color=#ff9901>the higher these are, the more luxurious</color> the reward for sending them Uma Musume.
期待度の高い募集の中にはお礼品として\\\\n移籍した<color=#ff990: Teams with high expectations will reward a piece of the transferred <color=#ff9901>Hall of Fame Uma Musume</color> as a thank you gift.
チームメンバーに特殊なアイコンが出ているトレーニング場所で\\\\nトレーニング: If you train at a training location where a team member has a special icon, \"<color=#ff9900>Aoharu Special Training</color>\" will occur, and <color=#ff9900>that team member's basic abilities will increase</color>. Let's use the Aoharu Training to grow our team so we can win the Aoharu Hai!
さらに、<color=#ff9900>2人以上</color>のチームメンバーと: Furthermore, a Special Training session <color=#ff9900>with 2 or more</color> team members, will <color=#ff9900>boost your Uma Musume's training efficiency</color> as well. <color=#ff9900>Basic abilities and skill points gained</color> will also increase <color=#ff9900>the more team members</color> participate.
アオハル特訓を何回も行ったチームメンバーは、\\\\n一度だけ<color=#f: Team members you have had many Special Trainings with can have an <color=#ff9900>Aoharu Spirit Explosion</color> once. Their <color=#ff9900>basic abilities will increase greatly</color> and <color=#ff9900>your Uma Musume will also grow and get Skill Hints</color> The key to success is <color=#ff9900>generating many Aoharu Spirit Explosions</color>!
現在持っているアイテムを確認することができます。\\\\nまた、消費アイテムを使: You can check the items you currently have. You can also use consumable items. Some items can be converted to Money. <color=#ff9900>Converting items cannot be undone</color>, so be careful.
チームメンバーが成長することで、<color=#ff9900>チーム総合力</c: As team members grow, <color=#ff9900>team strength</color> will increase and you will receive gifts from Tazuna. Also, each member's <color=#ff9900>Training Lv will increase</color> with their basic ability. <color=#ff9900>The strength of your team will lead to the growth of your Uma Musume</color> , so be proactive in training your team!
<color=#ff9900>チーム称号</color>とは、チーム総合力とチー: The <color=#ff9900>team title</color> is an <color=#ff9900>evaluation of your overall</color> team strength and team ranking. <color=#ff9900>The better the team title you have, the more your horse girl will grow in the ending</color> Let's win Aoharu Hai and get the strongest team title!
<color=#ff9900>イベントブースト</color>は、育成開始時にT: Using <color=#ff9900>Event Boost</color> you can spend twice the TP at the start of training to gain double the <color=#ff9900>Event Pt</color> and <color=#ff9900>Roulette coins</color> at the end.
<color=#ff9900>同一のサポートカード</color>を使用して<c: You can <color=#ff9900>uncap</color> support cards by using <color=#ff9900>duplicates of the same card</color> . The level limit will be increased. SR and SSR support cards can also be uncapped by using <color=#ff9900>Release Crystals</color>.
<color=#ff9900>ショータイムモード</color>で育成を完了する: When you end training in <color=#ff9900>Showtime Mode</color>, your <color=#ff9900>SHOW Gauge</color> will rise according to your progress and the difficulty level. You will receive <color=#ff9900>additional rewards</color> according to the number of times you've filled your SHOW Gauge to MAX.
ショータイムモードでは、育成中のレースで、\\\\n<color=#ff9900: In Showtime Mode, the <color=#ff9900>opponent Uma Musume</color> will become stronger in training races. When you see the <color=#ff9900>good ending of your Uma Musume</color> at the chosen difficulty level, the next level will be unlocked and can be challenged from next training.
<color=#ff9900>適性に合わせたウマ娘</color>を育成したり、: You can earn more points by training Uma Musume <color=#ff9900>according to their aptitude</color> and by achieving the specified <color=#ff9900>Score Bonus</color> conditions.
「<color=#ff9900>トレーナー技能試験</color>」で、\\\\: In the <color=#ff9900>Trainer Proficiency Exam</color>, you can check the <color=#ff9900>usage rate of support cards</color> for each test in the ranking!
本育成シナリオでは育成ウマ娘それぞれの目標はなく、\\\\n<color=#ff: A scenario without individual goals, <color=#ff9900>instead chasing \"Result Points\"</color>. Acquire fixed amounts from each of the 3 years! You can freely enter any races during training, and obtained Pts depend on the race's grade and finishing position!
<color=#ff9900>育成目標をすべて達成</color>すると\\\\: <color=#ff9900>Once all training objectives are complete</color>, you can challenge the <color=#ff9900>Twinkle Star Climax</color>! Emerge victorious over the 3-race battle to claim your place as \"Twinkle Top Star\"!
レースで入着すると成績Ptのほかに<color=#ff9900>「ショップコイン: When entering races, you will <color=#ff9900>obtain Shop Coins</color>! Shop Coins can be traded for training items in the special shop. Training items can increase stats, recover energy, boost training growths, and have <color=#ff9900>various other effects that are sure to help your training</color>!
<color=#ff9900>毎年12月後半のターン終了時</color>に、各: <color=#ff9900>After each second half of December</color>, when changing years, <color=#ff9900>the most outstanding horsegirl is recognized</color>. Do well in races while deepening bonds with your supporters to increase your fans! When chosen, your horsegirl's unique skill will level up, in addition to other improvements!
育成中、レースに「ライバル」が出走することがあります。\\\\nライバルがいる<: Sometimes Rivals will enter races. When <color=#ff9900>entering and winning those races</color> your <color=#ff9900>horsegirl's stats will grow</color>, and she can <color=#ff9900>obtain Skill Hints</color>. Grow your horsegirls more by having them fight these tough opponents!
トゥインクルスタークライマックスでは、\\\\n<color=#ff9900>各: In the Twinkle Star Climax, <color=#ff9900>you gain Result Pt based on your finishing position</color>, and the <color=#ff9900>horsegirl with the most Pts over 3 races is the winner</color>. Aim for the top with your carefully trained horsegirl!
繰り返し練習したいウマ娘たちを<color=#ff9900>マイ出走リスト</c: Save Umas in <color=#ff9900>My Entrants</color> to <color=#ff9900>select them easily</color> during registration! You can also save them from the results screen. Removing Training Partners, will remove them from My Entrants as well, so be careful!
全試験の<color=#ff9900>最高スコア</color>で<color=: You can view the <color=#ff9900>Top 100 highest scorers</color> in the ranking! The <color=#ff9900>Top 30 Uma Musume </color>can be<color=#ff9900> rented without limit</color> in the relevant scenario.
<color=#ff9900>トライアルコイン</color>は試験によって得ら: <color=#ff9900>Trial Coins</color> are earned for exams, and extra can be earned through <color=#ff9900>Score Bonuses</color>, <color=#ff9900>Exam Grades</color>, and <color=#ff9900>Missions</color>.
<color=#ff9900>強化アイテム</color>を使用して、\\\\n: You can increase the <color=#ff9900>Hint Lv</color> of your horsegirl's skills by using <color=#ff9900>upgrade items</color>. When doing so, she will start training with her <color=#ff9900>Hint Lv already raised</color> for those skills.
レーシングカーニバルのレースに出走すると<color=#ff9900>カーニバル: Race in the Carnival to gain <color=#ff9900>Carnival Pts</color>. Points are awarded for skill uses and finishing position.
<color=#ff9900>カーニバルレース</color>に挑戦すると<co: As you complete <color=#ff9900>Carnival Races</color>, your <color=#ff9900>Challenge Gauge</color> will fill. When full, you can enter a <color=#ff9900>Challenge Race</color>. Challenge Races come in <color=#ff9900>VERY HARD and EXTREME</color> difficulties.
イベントレースで5着以内に入ると<color=#ff9900>カーニバルボーナス: Your horsegirl will gain the <color=#ff9900>Carnival Factor</color> when finishing top 5 in an event race. When a horsegirl inherits this factor, she will gain <color=#ff9900>bonus stats and a chance to max mood</color> in the event races.
<color=#ff9900>カーニバルボーナススキル</color>を持つウマ: When a horsegirl with the <color=#ff9900>Carnival Bonus Skill</color> finishes top 5 in an event race, the factor will <color=#ff9900>Lv up</color>. The <color=#ff9900>stat bonus and max mood chance will increase</color> with skill level.
レーシングカーニバルのレースで獲得した<color=#ff9900>カーニバルP: The <color=#ff9900>Carnival pts</color> obtained in Racing Carnival races can be <color=#ff9900>traded for items</color> in the shop!
デイリーレジェンドレースに挑戦してみましょう。\\\\n対戦するLEGENDウマ: Challenge the daily Legend races! Pieces of the challenged Legend horsegirl can be acquired. Tickets will <color=#ff9900>refill to max</color> every day.
自分だけの<color=#ff9900>オリジナル名刺</color>を作成して: Create your own <color=#ff9900>Trainer Card</color>, and share it as an image on social media. Show your info along with horsegirl, support and <color=#ff9900>customizable graphics</color>.
代表ウマ娘が所持している<color=#ff9900>因子情報</color>に: <color=#ff9900>Factors</color> for your representative horsegirl can also be <color=#ff9900>shared on social media</color>. Show off your glorious horsegirl on your card!
<color=#ff9900>フォト機能</color>を活用することで、<co: The <color=#ff9900>Snapshot function</color> allows you to take photos of <color=#ff9900>Races, Lives, and Stories</color>. Snapshots can be processed and edited in a few ways to add your own flair.
撮影したフォトは<color=#ff9900>フォトライブラリ</color>に: Saved snapshots are stored in the <color=#ff9900>Photo Library</color> and accessible at any time、They can also be used on your <color=#ff9900>Trainer Card</color>.
初めての育成は、まずはウマ娘たちをより知るために\\\\n<color=#ff9: For your first training <color=#ff9900>we recommend you play the URA Finals scenario</color> to get to know the horsegirls better! Many things happen on the path you both take towards her unique goals. Aim to win on the big, dream-like stage of the URA Finals!
本育成シナリオでしか見られない、\\\\n<color=#ff9900>シナリオ: Each scenario <color=#ff9900>has many exclusive events!</color> We hope you will enjoy discovering new aspects of the horsegirls through their daily life and their expressions as they go through the seasons!
<color=#ff9900>みんなでトップウマドルプロジェクト</color>: <color=#ff9900>Everyone's Top Umadol Project</color> is an event where rewards are gained for obtaining fans through training. Personal rewards are obtained based on total fans gained in training mode.
<color=#ff9900>ゴルシちゃんモード</color>で育成を完了する: When finishing training in <color=#ff9900>Golshi-chan Mode</color> you will gain rewards based on progress. In Golshi-chan mode <color=#ff9900>opponents in races</color> will be stronger.
イベント全体報酬は<color=#ff9900>イベントに参加した全トレーナーが: Overall rewards are based on <color=#ff9900>total fans gained by all trainers in the event</color>. The more fans, the more luxurious the rewards.
ルームマッチに参加させたいウマ娘を<color=#ff9900>\\\\nマイ出: Save horsegirls in <color=#ff9900>My Entrants</color> to <color=#ff9900>select them easily</color> during registration! You can also save them from the results screen.
育成ウマ娘の衣装をお気に入りのものに変更してみましょう！\\\\n<color=: Dress your horsegirls in your favorite outfits! Changing the outfit of a horsegirl will change it for <color=#ff9900>all of her Hall of Fame versions</color>. Note that in some situations the outfit won't display.
育成開始前の最終確認からイベントブーストを選択し、\\\\n<color=#ff: You can select <color=#ff9900>Double TP Usage</color> at the start of training to <color=#ff9900>double SHOW gauge fill rate</color> at the end.
全4回の告知ライブの後、<color=#ff9900>グランドライブ</colo: After 4 Promotional Lives, the <color=#ff9900>Grand Live</color> is held! Keeping things fresh and <color=#ff9900>learning various tracks</color> for each Live will greatly benefit your horsegirls!
トレーニングを行うことで獲得できる<color=#ff9900>パフォーマンスは: Through training, <color=#ff9900>5 different Performances</color> can be earned! Which ones go with which training changes every turn.
獲得できるパフォーマンスは<color=#ff9900>トレーニングLvの高さ<: The Performances earned increase with the <color=#ff9900>training's level</color> and the <color=#ff9900>amount of horsegirls participating</color>. Friendship training will also provide 2 Performances!
獲得したパフォーマンスは<color=#ff9900>レッスン</color>で: The Performances earned can be spend on <color=#ff9900>Lessons</color> to gain <color=#ff9900>Tracks or Live Techniques</color>. Both of these are highly useful to the <color=#ff9900>development of your horsegirls</color>.
<color=#ff9900>レッスン</color>ではパフォーマンスを消費し: Performances can be spent on <color=#ff9900>Lessons</color> to gain <color=#ff9900>Tracks or Live Techniques</color>! Learning these will provide an immediate <color=#ff9900>Talent Bonus</color>, and Tracks will additionally provide a <color=#ff9900>Live Bonus</color> which will be active from the next Live until the end of training.
習得に必要なパフォーマンスが足りないときは<color=#ff9900>予約</: When lacking the Performances for a Lesson, it can be <color=#ff9900>reserved</color>. Doing so will display the <color=#ff9900>Performances needed</color> to learn it in the Training screens.
楽曲を習得するたびに<color=#ff9900>ライブ期待度</color>が: Each Track learned will increase the <color=#ff9900>Live Anticipation</color>. Maxing this gauge will ensure the live's <color=#ff9900>Great Success</color>. Anticipation will reset every live, so prepare new Tracks for each live!
<color=#ff9900>ライブ</color>では、<color=#ff9: At a <color=#ff9900>Live</color>, the <color=#ff9900>songs learnt will be played</color>. With a specific number of new Tracks, the <color=#ff9900>live will be a Great Success</color>. Horsegirls will <color=#ff9900>grow more</color> when the live is a Great Sucess, so aim for this using the Anticipation gauge as reference.
新たに習得した楽曲がある状態でライブを終えると\\\\n次のターンから<colo: When new Tracks are played at a Live, their <color=#ff9900>Live Bonus</color> will be active from the next turn. Similar bonuses will <color=#ff9900>stack</color>.
<color=#ff9901>特別移籍 StarHorse4 Edition</: In <color=#ff9901>Special Transfer StarHorse4 Edition</color> you can transfer your trained horsegirls to another team to receive rewards. Be careful, the transfer is permanent, and you can't just call those girls back!
移籍先チームのウマ娘の募集には<color=#ff9901>期待度</color: The <color=#ff9901>expectations</color> of the receiving teams differ, and based on that and the horsegirl you sent the rewards can change. <color=#ff9901>That one trainer</color> seems to have a request of <color=#ff9901>☆4 difficulty</color>!
期待度3の募集では、お礼品として\\\\n移籍した<color=#ff9901>: In ☆3 difficulty requests, you will receive <color=#ff9901>pieces of the horsegirl you sent</color>. Moreover, from this difficulty onwards you can get <color=#ff9901>Star Fruits</color> exclusive to this <color=#ff9901>StarHorse4 Edition</color>.
7人のチームで<color=#ff9900>スカウトレース</color>に挑み: Take on Scout Races with a team of 7. The Team captain will be one of your trained horsegirls. The others can be selected through <color=#ff9900>scouting</color>. Build the strongest team through continuous <color=#ff9900>racing and scouting</color>!
<color=#ff9900>スカウトレースチケット</color>は、毎日12: You can obtain up to 5 <color=#ff9900>Scout Race Tickets</color> every day at 12. Daily missions and items can also grant you some. <color=#ff9900>Every 3 races</color>, the <color=#ff9900>race details</color> will change. You can check this from the Race Schedule.
スカウトレースに出走すると<color=#ff9900>スカウトPt</colo: Entering Scout Races will grant <color=#ff9900>Scout Pt</color>. The amount will vary based on race result, opponent team rank, and any bonuses. Aim to win a variety of different races!
<color=#ff9900>スカウトタイム</color>では、相手チームのウ: During <color=#ff9900>Scout Time</color>, you can <color=#ff9900>scout</color> the opponent's horsegirls and swap around your own team. The <color=#ff9900>Scout Pt</color> needed to scout depend on the target horsegirl's rank.
チームを強化し、<color=#ff9900>チームランクを更新</color>: Strengthen your team and <color=#ff9900>increase team rank</color> to receive rewards. In addition, clear <color=#ff9900>limited missions</color> to gain more rewards!
<color=#ff9900>スカウトレース</color>で<color=#f: When you <color=#ff9900>win</color> a <color=#ff9900>Scout Race</color>, the team captain and members' are registered in the Roster, and you will get a bonus to the entire team's stats and your Scout Pt. Further, by drafting specific combinations of horsegirls in your team you can obtain <color=#ff9900>Team Skills</color>.
<color=#ff9900>イベントブースト</color>は、育成開始時にT: The <color=#ff9900>Event Boost</color> lets you use double the TP at the start of training to double the amount of <color=#ff9900>Trial Coin</color> received at the end.
<color=#ff9900>ログインおさんぽボーナス</color>や<col: You can fill the <color=#ff9900>Stroll Gauge</color> by playing <color=#ff9900>various parts of the game</color> or through the <color=#ff9900>stroll login bonus</color>. Once the gauge is at <color=#ff9900>MAX</color>, you can <color=#ff9900>take a stroll</color> with one of your horsegirls. ※The login bonus fills the gauge fully. Go for a stroll to start filling it through play.
フォトスタジオでは、<color=#ff9900>トレーニング</color>、: With the Photo Studio you can take <color=#ff9900>photos at training, outings</color>, and various other settings.
フォトを撮影したいウマ娘を選択後、\\\\n<color=#ff9900>季節や: After selecting a horsegirl to photograph, you can set up the <color=#ff9900>seasons, locations, and so on</color>. For <color=#ff9900>training photos</color> partners can also be selected.
フォトの撮影中は、<color=#ff9900>画面の一時停止・ループ</col: During shooting the action can be <color=#ff9900>paused or looped</color>. Find the perfect timing to snap your favourite shots! Photos can also be <color=#ff9900>edited with filters and the like</color>.
おさんぽへ行くと<color=#ff9900>おさんぽ相手</color>のウマ: Going for a stroll increases your <color=#ff9900>Stroll Partner's Friendship</color>. Different <color=#ff9900>destinations</color> will play unique animations and provide different <color=#ff9900>rewards</color>. During the campaign you can rewatch any animations you've seen by long-clicking a horsegirl.
「KIRARI MAGIC SHOW」キャンペーンページでは、\\\\nクリスマ: On the KIRARI MAGIC SHOW campaign page you can check not only campaign info but from 21 December you can join in on the TOKYO MEGA ILLUMI collab event, as well as find a gift hiding in the <color=#ff9900>present box once a day</color>.
『東京メガイルミ』とコラボしたクリスマスライブをするため\\\\n大井レース場に: The horsegirls gather at the Ooi Racecourse for the TOKYO MEGA ILLUMI Christmas Live collab. But the MEGA TREE's decorations are lagging behind!? It's time for the horsegirls's power to shine☆ With everyone's help the MEGA TREE will be glittering in no time!
トレーニングに<color=#ff9900>ハッピーミークが登場！</color: <color=#ff9900>Happy Meek</color> will appear in training! Work together with her and aim to enter the URA Finals!
ランダムでハッピーミークとのトレーニング後に\\\\n基礎能力や体力の値を競い合: Training with her can trigger a <color=#ff9900>Duel</color> around a specific stat or energy level! The higher this chosen Duel Subject is, the easier it will be to win the Duel, so train well!
育成期間中に一定回数対決で勝利を重ねると、\\\\n<color=#ff9900: Should you manage to win a certain number of Duels, a <color=#ff9900>stronger Happy Meek</color> will appear in the URA Finals! Train your horsegirl to take victory on the Finals stage!
アオハル魂爆発が発生済みのチームメンバーにアオハル特訓が発生\\\\nした場合一: After a team member has had a Spirit Explosion, they can have one further <color=#ff9900>EX Spirit Explosion</color>! This will <color=#ff9900>grant them even more stats, as will your horsegirl, who will additionally receive a special skill hint</color>! EX Spirit Explosions add even more fire to your training!
<color=#ff9900>特殊な条件</color>を満たすと、アオハル杯に: Under <color=#ff9900>certain conditions</color>, you can face a <color=#ff9900>Powerhouse Team</color> in the Aoharu Hai! When winning against this team your horsegirl will grow considerably! <color=#ff9900>Something may happen in the finals</color> too…!?
東京メガイルミコラボイベント「KIRARI MAGIC SHOW」は\\\\n<: In the TOKYO MEGA ILLUMI collab event, KIRARI MAGIC SHOW, you will receive rewards for gathering <color=#ff9900>ornaments for the tree</color> from training and missions. Individual rewards will be handed out based on the amount you collect.
イベントに参加する全トレーナーでオーナメントを集めて、メガツ\\\\nリーを輝か: With the <color=#ff9900>ornaments gathered by all trainers</color> we can make the MEGA TREE glitter as it should. Watch the <color=#ff9900>tree change</color> on the event homepage and help claim the extravagant global event rewards by collecting tons of ornaments!

ラストスパートであまり速く走れなかったら\\nスピード不足かもしれませんよ。: If you can't run very \nfast in the last spurt, \nyou might lack speed.
終盤で順位が下がりやすいなと思ったら\\nスタミナ切れかもしれませんよ。: Dropping positions at \nthe end of the race may \nsignal a lack of stamina.
なかなか前に行かないなと思ったら\\nパワーをつけると良いかもしれませんよ。:
If you feel like you're 
not moving forward very 
well, you might want 
more power.
終盤の追い上げが課題だなと思ったら\\n根性が足りないのかもしれませんよ。: If catching up at the \nend is a challenge, you \nmay not have enough guts.
賢さが高いと、上手く位置取りできたり\\nスキルを発揮しやすいみたいですよ。: It seems high wisdom\nimproves positioning and\nskill usage.
マニーやサポートポイントが不足したら\\nデイリーレースに出走してみましょう。:
If you run out of Money 
or Support Points, 
try running in the 
Daily Race.
サポートカードやウマ娘の強化は\\nレースの勝利にかなり重要ですよ。:
Strengthening support 
cards and horse girls is 
quite important for 
winning.
レースの勝敗は、天気やレース展開など\\n時には運が左右することも……。:
Sometimes luck plays a 
part in races, such as 
weather and race 
developments…
サポートカードのLvを上げると\\nより良いサポート効果が得られますよ。:
You can get better 
support effects by 
raising the Lv of your 
support cards.
サポートカードを上限解放して強化すると\\n強力なサポート効果が得られますよ。:
Uncapping and 
strenghtening support 
cards can net you 
powerful support effects.
サポート効果「やる気効果アップ」は、\\nマイナス効果もアップするので注意！: Note that \"Motivation \nBonus\" also increases \nthe negative effect!
サポート効果「パラメータボーナス」系は\\nトレーニングの際に効果を発揮しますよ:
The "Stat Bonus" type 
support effects will be 
effective during 
training.
サポート効果「トレーニング効果アップ」は\\nどのトレーニングでも効果を発揮しま: \"Training Effectiveness\nUp\" will be effective in\nany training.
サポート効果「初期パラメータアップ」系は\\n高い基礎能力で育成を開始できますよ:
"Initial Stat Increase" 
effects allow you to 
start training with 
higher stats.
サポート効果「初期絆ゲージアップ」は\\n早く絆ゲージを上げたい時にオススメです: \"Initial Bond Gauge Up\"\nis useful to raise your\nbond gauge quickly.
サポート効果「レースボーナス」と「ファン\\n数ボーナス」は目標レースも対象です: \"Race Bonus\" and \"Fan \nCount Bonus\" also apply \nto target races.
サポート効果「レースボーナス」は\\nスキルPtを獲得したい時にオススメです。: \"Race Bonus\" is \nrecommended when you \nwant to gain SkillPt.
サポート効果「ヒントLvアップ」は、\\n一度に上がるヒントLvが高くなりますよ: \"Hint Lv. Bonus\" \nincreases the amount \nhint levels go up.
サポート効果「ヒント発生率アップ」は\\nヒントイベントが起きやすくなりますよ。: \"Hint Rate Up\" will make \nit easier for hint \nevents to occur.
サポート効果「得意率アップ」は、\\n得意トレーニングに登場しやすくなります。:
"Specialty Rate Up" 
increases appearance 
rate in their training 
specialty.
サポート効果「イベント回復量アップ」は\\nイベントでの体力回復量が増えます。: \"Event Recovery Amount\nUp\" increases energy\nrecovery in events.
サポート効果「イベント効果アップ」は\\nイベントで得られる効果が上昇します。:
"Event Effect Increase" 
will increase the 
effects obtained from 
events.
サポート効果「失敗率ダウン」は、一緒に\\nトレーニングすると失敗しにくくなりま:
"Failure Rate Down" 
makes it harder to 
fail a training with 
that card.
サポート効果「体力消費ダウン」は、一緒に\\nトレーニングすると体力が減りにくい: \"Energy Discount\" lowers\nenergy consumed when you\ntrain together.
サポート効果「賢さ友情回復量アップ」は\\n友情トレーニングで多く体力が回復しま:
"Wisdom Training 
Recovery" recovers lots 
of energy when 
friendship training.
友情トレーニングが複数発生した場合は\\nさらに効果が高くなりますよ。: It's even more effective\nwhen multiple friendship\ntrainings overlap.
サポートカードを編成すると、そのカードに\\n沿ったイベントが発生しやすくなりま: Events from chosen \nsupport cards, will \noccur much more easily.
編成していないサポートカードの\\nイベントが発生することもありますよ。: Sometimes you'll get an \nevent for a support card \nyou don't have organized.
育成ウマ娘と同じサポートカードは\\n編成できないので注意してくださいね。:
You cannot include 
support cards of the 
horsegirl you are 
training.
不要なサポートカードは蹄鉄に変換でき、\\nショップでアイテムと交換ができますよ:
Unwanted cards can be 
converted to horseshoes, 
exchangeable for items 
in the store.
サポートカード詳細の「育成イベント」から\\n獲得可能なスキルヒントを確認できま: \"Training Events\" in a\ncard's details lists\nobtainable skill hints.
育成ウマ娘は強化アイテムとマニーを\\n使用すると覚醒Lvが上げられますよ。: Horsegirl's Awakening Lv\ncan be increased with\nUpgrade Items and Money.
育成ウマ娘の覚醒Lvが上がると、育成\\n開始時に獲得可能なスキルが増えますよ。:
Higher Awakening Lvs 
grant your Uma more 
skills at the start of 
training.
覚醒Lvを上げる強化アイテムは、\\n育成のGⅢ以上のレースで\\n1着を取ると:
Upgrade Items can be 
obtained by winning a 
race of GIII or higher 
in training.
同じウマ娘のピースを集めることで\\n才能開花できるようになりますよ。: By collecting pieces of \nthe same horse girl you \ncan develop her talents.
ウマ娘を才能開花すると固有スキルのLvや\\n基礎能力がアップしますよ。:
Uncapping your horsegirl 
increases the Lv of 
her unique skills and 
base stats.
★2以下の育成ウマ娘は★3以上になると\\n勝負服が獲得できますよ。: Uma Musu receive their \nRace Outfit when \nuncapped to ★3 or higher.
不要なピースはクローバーに変換でき、\\nショップでアイテムと交換できますよ。:
Convert unwanted pieces 
into clovers, 
exchangeable for items 
in the store.
殿堂入りウマ娘は、継承やチーム競技場など\\n各種レースで活用できますよ。:
Hall of Fame horse girls 
can be used in 
inheritance, team arena, 
and races.
殿堂入りウマ娘は、一度移籍すると\\n元には戻せないので注意してくださいね。:
Once a Hall of Fame Uma 
Musu has been 
transferred, she cannot

育成完了時の評価点はパラメータの合計値と\\n獲得スキルから計算されています。:
An Uma's score in 
training is calculated 
from the value of stats

殿堂入りウマ娘は、育成状況に応じて\\n確率で因子を獲得しますよ。:
Uma Musu entering the 
Hall of Fame, gain 
chance and status based 
factors.
因子にはレアリティがあり、★の数が\\n多いほど、効果が高くなります。: Factors have a rarity, \nand the more ★'s, the \nmore effective.
育成で良い結果を出すほど\\n多くの因子が獲得しやすくなります。:
The better you do in 
training, the easier it 
is to acquire more 
factors.
因子には育成開始時の継承イベントで\\n効果を発揮するものがあります。:
Some factors have an 
effect on the 
inheritance event at the 
start of training.
基礎能力の因子が発動すると\\nパラメータがアップします。: When the basic ability\nfactor is activated, the\nparameter is increased.
適性の因子が発動すると\\nバ場、距離、脚質の適性がアップします。:
Aptitude factors 
increase aptitude for 
surface, distance, or 
running style.
スキルの因子が発動すると\\nスキルのヒントLvがアップしますよ。: Skill factors grant you\nthe skill or increase\nits Hint Lv.
レースの因子が発動するとパラメータや\\nスキルのヒントLvがアップします。:
When the race factor is 
activated, the parameter 
and skill Hint Lv is 
increased.
既に獲得しているスキルの因子の継承効果が\\n発動するとステータスが上昇します。: Inheritance factors of\nalready acquired skills\nincrease status.
継承ウマ娘は育成で利用しても、なくなら\\nないので、どんどん活用しましょう。: Parent horsegirls are \nnot lost in inheritance, \nso use them without fear.
継承ウマ娘はフレンドからマニーを使用\\nすることで、レンタルできますよ。: You can rent parent Uma\nMusume from your friends\nfor Money.
クラスメイト、同室、メジロ家といった\\n関係性が相性の良さに影響するとか……。: Class/roommates, family, \nand such relationships \nmay affect compatability…
サークルメンバーから継承ウマ娘をレンタル\\nする場合、マニーが割引されますよ。:
Renting a parent horse

時には、フレンドの「代表ウマ娘」の\\n育成情報も参考にしてみましょう。:

掛かっていると焦って持久力を失います。\\n賢さを上げると発生しにくくなりますよ:
"Kakari" will cause 
panic and HP loss.

the chance.
コース取りが上手いと、前にウマ娘が\\nいる時にかわして前に進みやすいですよ。: Good lane changes ease\ndodging Uma Musu to\nmove forward.
短距離レースでは\\n特にスピードが重要です。: Speed is especially\nimportant in short\ndistance races.
マイルレースでは\\n特にスピードとパワーが大事です。: Speed and power are \nespecially important in \na mile race.
長距離レースでは\\n特にスタミナと根性が大事です。: Stamina and guts are\nespecially important in\nlong distance races.
パドックでの印は◎＞○＞▲＞△の順で\\n高く評価されていることを表します。: The marks in the paddock \nindicate appraisal in \nthe order of ◎>○>▲>△.
神社にお出かけに行くと悪い\\nコンディションが解消されるかも？: Maybe a trip to the \nshrine will help you get \nrid of bad conditions?
乙名史記者と絆を深めると\\nURAファイナルズ後に……？: If you bonded with \nreporter Otonashi, after \nthe URA Finals …?
継承ウマ娘の相性が良いと\\n想いを受け継ぎやすいとか……。:
It's easier to pass 
on feelings when the 
parent Uma Musu are 
a good match.
サポートカードイベントでは、\\nレアスキルのヒントLvが上がることも！？: Support card events can \nalso increase the Hint \nLV of rare skills!
「ホーム」の学園の掲示板には\\nウマ娘に関する情報が掲載されています。: The school's bulletin\nboard (Home) holds info\nabout horsegirls.
短距離は1400m以下のレースで、\\nマイルは1401m～1800mまでの\\: Short distance means \n1400m or less, and mile \nis from 1401m to 1800m.
中距離は1801m～2400mまでのレースで、\\n長距離は2401m以上のレー:
Middle distance is 
between 1801m and 2400m, 
while long distance 
starts from 2401m.
雨や雪により良、稍重、重、不良の順で\\nバ場状態は悪化し、走りづらくなります。:
Rain/snow worsen the 
going; good > yielding >

difficult to run.
GⅠ＞GⅡ＞GⅢ＞OP＞Pre-OPの順で\\nレースの格（グレード）は高くなり: The grade of races \nfollows this order: GI > \nGII > GIII > OP > Pre-OP.

The higher the grade of

prize" graded races, G1

prestigious.

which you ran the most

If you don't want to

名勝負になる舞台は整いましたね: The stage is set for a great game.
バ場が乾いているので\\\\n足元が滑るかもしれませんね: The field is still drying so we could see a few slips.
このくらいのバ場のほうが\\\\n合っているウマ娘もいますからね: The state of the surface suits a few of the running Uma Musume.
このくらい引き締まったバ場ですと\\\\nスピードに乗りやすいですよ: It's easy to get up to speed on a firm surface like this.
日本のコースは水はけが良いですからね: Japanese courses are very well drained.
雨が本格化したら\\\\n難しいレースになってしまいそうですね: It's going to be a difficult race when the rains start in earnest.
スピードは出しやすいですが\\\\n脚への負担が心配です: It's easy to go fast, but I'm worried about the strain on their legs.
ここまで重たいバ場だと\\\\n得意、不得意が出てきちゃいますね: With the field this heavy we're sure to see the different strenghts and weaknesses.
かなり苦労するバ場ですね\\\\nコース取りにも注意です: It's a fairly difficult surface to navigate. One must be careful with their line.
こんなに荒れていると\\\\nレース展開が読みにくいですよ: It's hard to predict the race when it's so rough out there.
これは相当走りにくそうなバ場状態ですね: This looks like a very difficult place to run.
雪がどれだけ影響するか、心配です: I'm worried about how much the snow will affect them.
雪も考慮して走らないといけないですね: You have to take the snow into account when you run.
雪化粧と言えば聞こえはいいですが\\\\n走る娘たちにすればやっかいですね: Snow-covered may sound nice, but it's troublesome for our running girls.
この雪は敵か味方か\\\\nウマ娘たちの適性が試されます: Will this snow be helpful or a hindrance? The girl's aptitudes will be tested.
気合充分！ いい顔してますね！: She's up for it! Look at that expression!
火花散らすデッドヒートに期待しましょう: Let's hope for a sparking dead heat!
私が一番期待しているウマ娘\\\\n気合い入れてほしいですね！: I'm looking forwards to seeing the Uma Musume I'm most excited about give it their all!
さすがスタートに定評のあるふたりですね: They're both known for their good starts, and you can see why.
このスタートの良さが彼女の強さですね: These strong starts are her strength.
みんな出方をうかがったのかもしれませんね: Maybe they were all waiting to see what would happen.
みんな集中してましたね\\\\n好レースが期待できそうです: Everyone was very focused. I think we can expect a good race.
出遅れた娘の巻き返しに期待しましょう: Let's hope the late starting girl can regain her footing.
いいライバル関係になりそうですね: It's going to be a good rivalry.
まだこれからですよ\\\\n頑張ってほしいですね！: They've got a long way to go, I hope they can persevere!
ちょっと厳しい位置ですが\\\\nここからの巻き返しに期待です: She's in a bit of a tough position, but I'm hoping for a turn-around.
まだこれからですよ\\\\nここからの巻き返しに期待です: It's a long way to go. I'm expecting things to turn around from here.
ちょっと厳しい位置ですが\\\\n頑張ってほしいですね！: She's in a bit of a tough position but I hope she can hold out!
互いに牽制しあっていますからね\\\\n仕掛けるタイミングで\\\\n明暗が分か: They're keeping each other in check. Timing their moves right will be crucial.

現在の総合トップは%h_player、\\\\nこのまま最強の称号を手にするのか: The current overall leader is %h_player, will she continue to take the title of the strongest! Twinkle Star Climax Final Round 3! It's about to begin!
1着でゴールし%h_player_ta！\\\\n最強の座に向け、最高の滑り出し: She finished first and %h_player_ta! She's off to a great start on her quest for the title of strongest!

第2戦を制し%h_player_ta！\\\\n最終戦に向け、大きく勢いをつけま: We won the second round and %h_player_ta! We have a big momentum going into the final round!
1着でゴールし%h_player_ta！\\\\nこれで2勝！\\\\n栄光ヘ向: She finished in first place and %h_player_ta! This is two wins!
勝ちました%h_player！\\\\nこれで総合1位となり、\\\\nトゥイン: We've won, %h_player! This puts us in first place overall and puts us well on our way to the Twinkle Top Star!
勝っ%h_player_ta！\\\\nこの長き戦いも終わり、\\\\nついにト: The winner is %h_player_ta! The long battle is over, and the Twinkle Top Star will finally be crowned!
1着は%h_player！\\\\nこれでトゥインクルスタークライマックス\\\: First place goes to %h_player! This concludes all three rounds of the Twinkle Star Climax, and finally the Twinkle Top Star is born!
最終第3戦を制し%h_player_ta！\\\\n他を寄せ付けぬ圧倒的実力！い: The winner of the third and final round, %h_player_ta! Here is the birth of the most powerful Uma-Musume ever!
やりました！ %h_player！\\\\n見事な逆転劇！\\\\n大一番を制し: They did it! %h_player! A stunning comeback! They've claimed victory in the decisive race and attained the title of Twinkle Top Star!
破天荒なちびっこ学園理事長・秋川の宣言で\\\\n設立された新レース<color: With an outrageous declaration, young academy chairwoman Akikawa establishes a new race — <color=#FF6D26>URA Finals</color>! Trainers and horsegirls work hand in hand to become its maiden champion!
チームで団結！ 新たな青春！ ……と、\\\\n急遽始まったチーム対抗戦<col: Team up! A new experience awaits! …So began the sudden new team battle — <color=#FF6D26>Aoharu Hai</color>. But before the fun can start the academy faces a crisis!? Stand united and claim victory to save the freedoms of Tracen Academy!
ウマ娘たちはなぜライブをするのか？\\\\n突如現れたプロデューサーが提言した\: Why do horsegirls sing at lives? A producer suddenly appears to propose a new plan; the <color=#FF6D26>Grand Live</color>. Horsegirls face their lives from a different perspective, and the answers they reach are—!
メディア主導で設立された新レース\\\\n<color=#FF6D26>『トゥイ: A new race established by the media, <color=#FF6D26>\"Twinkle Star Climax\"</color>. A battle to determine the strongest! Run towards your own climax, chasing your dreams!

レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\\\n速度がわずかに上がる: <size=22>Slightly increase speed by running a long spurt from the middle of the race\\n</size>
残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Increase speed and power lightly when close to the lead in last 200m\\n</size>
レース後半に前の方で\\\\n1番になる力をわずかに発揮する: <size=22>Be in the lead during the 2nd half of the race to show off your ability to take 1st place\\n</size>
最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\\\n末脚を使って速度が少し上がる: <size=22>Lightly increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight.\\n</size>
最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\\\nわずかに優位を保ちやすくなる: <size=22>Slightly easier to keep advantage if you have enough strength in the Final Leg straight\\n</size>
最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\\\n女帝たる走りで速度が少し上がる: <size=22>When passing from the midfield or further down in the last corner, slightly increase your speed with steps befitting an empress\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\\\n直線でわずかに抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>When battling near the front from the final corner on, breaking away on the straight becomes a little easier\\n</size>
レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\\\nつこうとして加速力が少し上がる: <size=22>Gain a slight increase in acceleration as you attempt to gain positions during the last corner of the race\\n</size>
レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\\\n持久力が少し回復し\\\\nさらに少: <size=22>When holding steady in a corner during the race's second half, recover a bit of energy, and increase speed a little bit for a short while\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\\\n強い: <size=22>When battling from the final corner on, slightly increase speed in line with your strong spirit when near the front on the final straight\\n</size>
レース後半に前の方で競り合うとバク\\\\nシン力（？）を発揮、速度が少し上がる: <size=22>While fighting for the lead during the second part of the race, lightly increase your speed through displaying your Bakushin power\\n</size>
レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\\\n持久力が回復する: <size=22>Be in good position during Middle Leg to recover endurance\\n</size>
最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を少し回復する: <size=22>Being at the back during the last corner, lightly restores your endurance when you see another horse girl\\n</size>
レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\\\nお告げの力で少し道を切り開く: <size=22>If during the Last Leg of the race your way to the front of the field is blocked, your power of divination will make it lightly easier to spot an opening\\n</size>
レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうに\\\\nなると闘志に火が付き速度が少し上がる: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, you gain a little bit more fighting spirit and lightly increase your speed\\n</size>
レースを冷静に運ぶことができると\\\\n残り200mで実力発揮、速度が上がる: <size=22>If you can get calm and composed through the race, you will be able to showcase your ability and increase your speed for the last 200m\\n</size>
レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を少し回復し\\\: <size=22>When in the middle of the pack around half distance, pick yourself up by recovering a bit of energy and increase speed slightly\\n</size>
レース後半に差を付けて先頭にいると\\\\nさらなる脚を使って、速度を上げる: <size=22>Be in the lead with a gap behind you during the latter race half to increase your speed, making even more use of your legs\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降で前の方にいると\\\\nギアを変えて加速力が上がる: <size=22>Increase acceleration from final corner onward by changing gears when in the front group\\n</size>
残り200m地点で前の方にいると\\\\n道を開いてすごく抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>Be close to the lead during the last 200m to make it easier to break through and find a way through the field\\n</size>
レース中間からロングスパートをかけて\\\\n速度が少しずつ上がる: <size=22>Gradually increase speed during the long spurt in Middle Leg\\n</size>
残り200mを切って前の方にいると\\\\n競り合いに強くなり速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed and power when close to the lead in last 200m\\n</size>
レース後半に前の方で\\\\n1番になる力を発揮する: <size=22>Display your power to take the lead when near the front during the latter half of the race\\n</size>
最終直線が迫ったとき好位置にいると\\\\n弾みを付けて加速力が上がる: <size=22>Be in a good position when nearing the final straight to gain momentum and increase your acceleration\\n</size>
最終直線で後ろの方から追い抜くと\\\\n末脚を使って速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed when passing in the back in Final Leg straight\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に後ろの方から\\\\n外を回って追い抜いていると\\\\n最終: <size=22>Gain speed on the last straight when passing around the outside in the back from the final corner on\\n</size>
最終直線で余力を持って前にいると\\\\nより優位を保ちやすくなる: <size=22>Easier to keep a good position in last straight with spare energy\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\\\n前または後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\\\n: <size=22>When near the front from the last corner on and close to the horsegirl in front or behind, increase speed through your kingly radiance\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降で外から追い抜くと\\\\n怪物的な力で、速度を上げる\\\\n: <size=22>Increase speed with monstrous power from final corner onward when passing from outside, more so when you were battling in the Mid Leg\\n</size>
レース終盤に3回追い抜くと\\\\n最終直線で速度がすごく上がる: <size=22>During the Last Leg of the race make three overtakes to strongly increase your speed on the final straight\\n</size>
最終コーナーで中団以降から追い抜くと\\\\n女帝たる走りで速度が上がる: <size=22>When passing from the midfield or further down in the last corner, increase your speed with steps befitting an empress\\n</size>
レース終盤に2回追い抜くと間近で拝む\\\\nウマ娘ちゃんのあまりの尊さに思わず: <size=22>When overtaking twice in the Last Leg, inadvertently increase speed and take a better line from seeing the precious horsegirls up close\\n</size>
レース終盤のコーナーで先頭にいると\\\\nこれ幸いと加速力を上げる: <size=22>On last corner, gain acceleration when in the first position\\n</size>
レース後半の直線で好位置にいる\\\\nまたは中団から前を狙うと\\\\n稲妻の: <size=22>Bolt like lightning on a straight in the latter half when in a good position or moving up from the middle of the pack\\n</size>
レース後半に好位置で競り合うと\\\\n走ることに心を躍らせて\\\\n速度を上: <size=22>A heart-throbbing competition for a good position in the race's latter half increases your speed\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に前の方で競り合うと\\\\n直線で抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>After battling near the front from the last corner on, it becomes easier to break away during the final straight\\n</size>
レース後半に中団から\\\\n『お友達』を追って速度を少しずつ上げ\\\\n前方: <size=22>In the race's second half, chase \"friends\" from the middle of the pack, gradually increasing speed and slightly slowing girls ahead.\\n</size>
レース終盤のコーナーで前の位置に\\\\nつこうとして加速力が上がる: <size=22>Increase acceleration as you attempt to overtake in last corner\\n</size>
レース中間に好位置で少し疲れてくると\\\\n気合を入れ直して大きく前へ踏み込む: <size=22>If you get a little tired while being in a good position in the middle of the race, your speed and acceleration increase\\n</size>
残り300mを切って先頭もしくは\\\\n前の方で先頭のウマ娘との距離が近いと\: <size=22>Increase speed when leading or close to the leading horsegirl with 300m to go\\n</size>
残り300m付近で前の方だと速度を少し\\\\n上げる、ちょうど坂を上りきったと: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when in the leading places with around 300m to go, highly so after just climbing a hill\\n</size>
レース後半のコーナーで控えていると\\\\n持久力を回復し\\\\nさらに少しの: <size=22>When holding steady in a corner during the race's second half, recover energy, and slightly increase speed for a little while\\n</size>
最終直線で先頭から離されていると\\\\n星に導かれるように速度が上がる\\\\: <size=22>When far from the front on the final straight, increase speed as if guided by the stars. Greatly so if all the way near the back\\n</size>
レース前半、中団以降に控え続けると\\\\n追い比べをしたとき、江戸っ子の底力を: <size=22>Unleash your latent Edoite strength to greatly increase speed when in Showdown if you've restrained yourself in the mid pack or further back during the first race half.\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に競り合っていると\\\\n最終直線で前方にいる時\\\\n強い: <size=22>When battling from the final corner on, increase speed in line with your strong spirit when near the front on the final straight\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に中団の内ラチ側にい\\\\nると勝利への道筋を見出して最終直線: <size=22>Increase speed and improve your course-taking ability by calculating your path to victory when close to the inner railing in the midfield from the last corner onwards.\\n</size>
レース中間付近で好位置にいる時に\\\\n追い抜くと勢いづき進出を開始する: <size=22>Gain momentum while in a good position when passing someone in the Middle Leg\\n</size>
最終直線を走行中に競り合うと\\\\n可憐にぶっ飛ばして速度を上げる: <size=22>When battling on the last straight, increase speed with a graceful drive\\n</size>
レース後半に前の方で競り合うと\\\\nバクシン力（？）を発揮、速度が上がる: <size=22>During the later half of the race, your speed increases when competing for the lead\\n</size>
残り200ｍ地点で先頭ではないとき\\\\n先頭から4バ身以内だと速度を上げる\: <size=22>Increase speed when not leading and within 4 lengths from the lead with 200m to go. Increase greatly when within 2 lengths\\n</size>
追い比べをしたとき、速度を少し上げる\\\\nダートレースでは嚙みつかんばかりの: <size=22>Increase speed during showdown Really bite down in a dirt race, additionally increasing acceleration\\n</size>
最終コーナー突入時まで冷静に後方で\\\\n控えていると残り300m地点でスピー: <size=22>Cast Haste to continually increase speed at 300m to go if you've restrained yourself calmly in the back until the final corner rush\\n</size>
レース中盤で好位置にいる時に\\\\n持久力がすごく回復する: <size=22>Recover a large amount of energy when in a good position during the Middle Leg\\n</size>
レース中盤の直線で前の方にいるとき\\\\n後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\\\n: <size=22>When near the front on a Mid Leg straight with a horsegirl close behind, your unyielding spirit becomes your power\\n</size>
レース終盤の残り400m地点で前の方\\\\nだと速度が上がる、さらにGⅠなど\: <size=22>Increase speed when near the front in the final leg with 400m to go. Greatly so when among top favourites on a large stage like GⅠ\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に追い抜こうとすると\\\\n残り400ｍ以降に好位置で速度が上: <size=22>Increase speed when in a good position with 400m to go after attempting an overtake in or after the final corner. Further increased speed when popularity is low.\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降で中団から\\\\n前へ出る時、切れ味が増し速度が上がる: <size=22>From the last corner on, when coming up from the midfield or lower, your focus sharpens to increase speed\\n</size>
レース中盤のコーナーで競り合っていた\\\\n場合、終盤かつ最終コーナー半ば以降: <size=22>Increase acceleration when in a good position from the 2nd half of a Final Leg Corner on, and having battled in a Mid Leg Corner\\n</size>
最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\\\\nウマ娘を見て持久力を回復する: <size=22>When in the back in last corner, restore your endurance when you see another horse girl\\n</size>
終盤最終コーナー以降に後方から迫ると\\\\n短い間加速力がちょっと上がり\\\: <size=22>Slightly increase acceleration for a short time, increasing strength and duration up to 3 times with each overtake, when closing in from the rear at or after the last corner in Final Leg.\\n</size>
レース終盤に前方が詰まると\\\\nお告げの力で道を切り開く: <size=22>When the front is packed during the Last Leg of the race, the oracle's power will open a path\\n</size>
落ち着いたまま、中盤の仕掛けどころの\\\\nまたは終盤の勝負どころのコーナーを: <size=22>Having kept your calm in the middle of the pack, your high spirits will increase acceleration during the decisive Middle or Final Leg corner\\n</size>
レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうにな\\\\nると秘めた闘志に火が付き速度が上が: <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed increases\\n</size>
レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り\\\\n200mで実力発揮、速度がすごく上: <size=22>After proceeding through the race calmly, your speed drastically increases during the last 200m\\n</size>
レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\\\n気合を入れ直して持久力を回復し\\\\n: <size=22>When in the middle of the pack around half distance, pick yourself up by recovering energy and increase speed slightly\\n</size>
スタート後からレース後半まで前の方を\\\\nキープすると気分を爆アゲして持久力: <size=22>A rush of emotions recover energy and gradually increase speed when staying in the front group for the entire first half of the race\\n</size>
終盤が迫ったどこかで前方にいると\\\\n速度を少しアゲる、短距離かマイル\\\: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when nearing the final leg in the leading pack. Slightly extended in Short or Mile races\\n</size>
最終直線に入ったとき好位置につけて\\\\nいると強い意志で速度が上がる\\\\: <size=22>Increase speed through strong determination when entering the final straight in a good position, greatly so when near the lead\\n</size>
前方にいるとき、レース後半の第3\\\\nコーナーで速度を少し上げる、または\\: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when in the lead group in the third corner after half distance, or push strongly forwards on the track's back straight during the Final Leg\\n</size>
残り300mを切って好位置にいるとき\\\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\\\: <size=22>When in a good position close to the girl ahead with less than 300m to go, your tempestuous spirit blossoms into speed\\n</size>
最終直線で後ろのウマ娘と距離が近いと\\\\nこの瞬間に懸け持久力をわずかに使い: <size=22>When the horsegirl behind is close on the final straight, put your all in this moment and highly increase your speed for a while at the cost of some stamina\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\\\n残り300mを切って先団にいるとき: <size=22>Increase speed through fiery fighting spirit when in the leading group with 300m to go, having made a pass from the Final Corner on\\n</size>
レース後半に中団から残り持久力に\\\\n応じたロングスパートをかけて\\\\n: <size=22>Start a long spurt based on remaining energy from the midfield in the race's latter half, slightly and continuously increasing speed\\n</size>
レース前半で控え、最終コーナー後半に\\\\n前の方だと長時間加速力をちょっと上: <size=22>Increase acceleration for an extended duration when near the front in the latter half of the final corner after having sat back a little during the first half of the race. Stronger effect when in 2nd place\\n</size>
残り400mを切って前の方で\\\\n詰め寄られるとファンの心に残る走りで\\\: <size=22>Break away more easily with a dash that will remain in your fan's memories when chased down in or near the lead with 400m to go\\n</size>
終盤が迫ったときどこかで速度を少し\\\\n上げ、さらに能力を引き出すスキルの\: <size=22>Increase speed slightly at some point when nearing Final Leg, additionally increase speed and acceleration based on the number of activated stat-boost skills\\n</size>
ダートレース中盤コーナーで競り合うと\\\\nラストスパート時好位置で加速力がわ: <size=22>Increase acceleration slightly when in good position at final spurt in a dirt race, after battling in a middle leg corner. Effect increased if remaining energy is high\\n</size>
残り300m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\\\n少し上げる、ダートレースで先頭の: <size=22>Increase speed slightly when near the front at 300m to the line. Push a little further ahead when close to the leader on dirt\\n</size>
中盤で2回スキルを使うと\\\\nよりリラックスして持久力が回復する: <size=22>Restore endurance if you activate two skills in the middle part of the race\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に前の方で\\\\n追いすがっていると最終直線を走行中\\\\n: <size=22>When chasing someone near the front from the last corner on, greatly increase speed on the last straight\\n</size>
スキルで持久力を回復すると\\\\nレース後半で前のほうにいる時に\\\\nレッ: <size=22>In the race's second half, increase speed when recovering endurance with skills while in front\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に先団で追い抜くと\\\\n煌めくような華麗な動きを披露し\\\: <size=22>Showcase your graceful motions to greatly increase speed for a short while when overtaking in the midfield from the final corner on\\n</size>
スキルで持久力を3回以上回復すると\\\\nレース後半で勝利に向かい\\\\n呼: <size=22>After recovering HP with skills thrice, recover your breath and break strongly for victory\\n</size>
レース後半どっかで速度をわずかに上げ\\\\nついでに使えそうなレアスキルを2つ: <size=22>Activate 2 useful-looking rare skills somewhere in the second half of the race, no questions asked.\\n</size>
レース中盤以降の下り坂で中団だと坂を\\\\n下った後少しの間速度を上げる\\\: <size=22>Slightly increase speed for a while after descending a hill in the midfield during or after the middle leg. Shift a further gear up on tracks in Tokyo\\n</size>
レース後半の直線で前の方にいると\\\\n速度を少し上げ続ける、さらに先頭で\\: <size=22>Contiously increase speed slightly on a straight during the latter race half when near the front Effect increases when leading with a horsegirl close behind\\n</size>
残り200m地点で前の方にいると速度を\\\\n上げる、さらに先頭のウマ娘と近い: <size=22>Increase speed when near the lead with 200m to go, additionally pushing further forwards with a powerful run when close to the leading horsegirl.\\n</size>
中盤に後ろの方で順位を下げた時に\\\\n優しい光で持久力をすごく回復する: <size=22>When passed in the back of the pack during Middle Leg, a gentle glow greatly recovers stamina\\n</size>
最終コーナーで中団から前を狙う時\\\\n魂を燃え滾らせて加速力を上げる: <size=22>On last corner, gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle pack\\n</size>
終盤の最終コーナー後半に先団にいると\\\\n速度が上がる、長距離レースかつ中盤: <size=22>Increase speed when in the lead group during the latter half of the last corner in the final leg Greatly so when having battled in the midleg of a long distance race\\n</size>
レース中盤で前の方から\\\\n仕掛け始める時に速度が上がる: <size=22>Increase speed in Middle Leg when overtaking someone close to lead\\n</size>
中盤のコーナーで中団以降にいるとき\\\\n近くにウマ娘ちゃんが3人以上いると\: <size=22>Increase speed by the power of moe when near at least 3 horsecuties in the midfield or further back during a middle leg corner\\n</size>
レース中盤にスキルを2つ発動すると\\\\n速度を少し上げ続ける、効果中スキルを: <size=22>Continually increase speed slightly when activating 2 skills in the middle leg. Effect increases up to 2 times when activating more skills in the duration\\n</size>
終盤最終コーナー以降に好位置にいると\\\\n速度を上げゴールまで遠い場合最高の: <size=22>Increase speed when in a good position from the last corner in the Final Leg on. If the finish is still far, also lightly increase acceleration to top off your awesome run\\n</size>
スタート後からレース後半まで\\\\n好位置を維持し続けるとレース中盤に\\\\: <size=22>Maintain a good position until the latter race half to pick your path to victory in the Middle Leg, increasing speed\\n</size>
中盤のコーナーで先団を走行中\\\\n後ろに他ウマ娘を検知すると\\\\nわずか: <size=22>When running in front of the pack during a Middle Leg corner and you detect a horsegirl behind, take a small breath and increase your speed\\n</size>
終盤目前下り坂で2番手以降先頭4バ身\\\\n以内なら少しの間速度を上げ\\\\: <size=22>Increase speed for a little while when within 4 lenghts of the lead during a downhill right before the final leg. Also increase acceleration on Medium Distances\\n</size>
レース中盤始めの方に前の方にいると\\\\n速度を少し上げ続け\\\\nおまけに: <size=22>Increase speed slightly for a while and recover energy when in the leading group during the early part of middle leg\\n</size>
終盤コーナーで後方で詰寄ると最終直線\\\\nで速度が上がる、終盤コーナーで追い: <size=22>Increase speed on the final straight when closing in from the back on a final leg corner. Effect increases with number of overtakes on said corner\\n</size>
ラストスパートの最終直線に中団以降で\\\\n速度を少しずつ上げ、効果中スキルを: <size=22>Gradually increase speed when in the midfield or further back on the Final Spurt's last straight (Increase effect up to 3x when activating skills during the effect period)\\n</size>
残り350mを切って\\\\n前の方で後ろのウマ娘との距離が近いと\\\\n譲ら: <size=22>Your never-die attitude makes it easier to slip away when near the front, and the girl behind is close with 350m to go\\n</size>
最終コーナー走行中に中団で競り合うと\\\\n抜け出しやすくなる: <size=22>If you're blocked in the middle of the pack at the final corner, it will become easier to get out\\n</size>
最終直線を好位置で走行中\\\\n前のウマ娘との距離が近いと\\\\n抜け出しや: <size=22>If you're in front after the final corner and about to overtake another girl, your speed and acceleration will increase\\n</size>
レース中間付近で先頭付近だと速度が\\\\n少しずつ上がる、ダートレースでは\\: <size=22>Increase speed gradually when approaching Middle Leg and closing in on the lead. Also recover energy slightly on Dirt\\n</size>
レース終盤で最終直線が迫ったとき\\\\n高みを目指して中団から速度を上げる: <size=22>Increase speed, aiming for greater heights, from the midfield when the final straight is coming up in the Final Leg\\n</size>
最終コーナーで先頭から離されていると\\\\nその距離が遠いほど頑張り続けて\\: <size=22>When away from the front at the last corner, gradually increase your speed, persisting longer the further away you are\\n</size>
レース後半に後方で詰め寄られると\\\\nマシマシの幸運パワーが身体に実り\\\: <size=22>In the second part of the race, increase speed when someone is drawing closer to you in the back of the pack\\n</size>
最終直線に入ったとき前の方だと速度を\\\\n上げ、前2人後ろ2人までの\\\\: <size=22>Increase speed and tire out the 2 girls behind and ahead of you when entering the final straight in the leading group\\n</size>
終盤目前の下り坂で中団に控えていて\\\\nゴールまで遠いとレースを\\\\n思: <size=22>Get really into the race and increase speed when holding steady in the mid-pack on a downhill right before the Final Leg and the finish line is still far.\\n</size>
最終コーナー以降に追い抜いていた場合\\\\n最終直線で中団から速度を上げる\\: <size=22>Increase speed from the middle pack on the final straight, having made a pass from the final corner on. Spur yourself on longer when not popular\\n</size>
レース前半、掛からず最後方付近に\\\\n控え続けていると、最終直線で\\\\n: <size=22>Flare your spirit to increase acceleration on the final straight, having kept your cool in the trailing group during the race's first half\\n</size>
レース中間付近で中団にいるとき\\\\n燦然と輝きを放って速度が上がり\\\\n: <size=22>Increase speed and shine brightly when in the midfield around the middle leg, also recovering energy slightly\\n</size>
終盤最終コーナーでスキルを発動すると\\\\n声援を胸に速度を少し上げる\\\\: <size=22>Speed increases slightly, or a lot when at Nakayama Racecourse, turning the cheers into power when activating a skill in the final corner during Final Leg.\\n</size>
レース後半に先団にいると残りの\\\\n持久力に応じたロングスパートをかけて\\: <size=22>Continuously increase speed lightly through a long spurt, based on remaining stamina, when in the leading group after half race distance.\\n</size>

友人タイプまたはグループタイプとのお出かけを1回以上行う: Go on an outing with a friend or group card

育成イベント「レース場グルメの誘惑」でお腹いっぱい食べられるように背中を押す: Push towards full tummies in the 'レース場グルメの誘惑' event
合宿中に「お休み＆お出かけ」を1回以上行う: Go on an outing and rest during summer camp
育成イベント「鏡よ、鏡」で美しすぎる故の罪を受け入れる: Embrace the sin of excessive beauty in the '鏡よ、鏡' event
育成イベント「激走・福ウマ娘レース！」で福ウマ娘になる: Become a Fortune Horsegirl in the '激走・福ウマ娘レース！' event

育成イベント「岐」で強豪たちとの戦いを望む: Look for a fight with the powerhouses in the '岐' event

育成イベント「いついかなる時も」「突然の厚意」「有言実行」のいずれかで理事長の評: Choose the option most appreciated by the chairwoman in one of these events: 'いついかなる時も', '突然の厚意', '有言実行'

「切れ者」を持つ状態で育成を完了する: Finish training with the Sharp condition
